title: Battle Angel
description: Do you ever feel like life is consistently bashing or bullying you? Extracting every pound of flesh?Battle The Ultimate She Warrior has been written with you in mind. Every female alive has their very own 'She' warrior buried inside. It's just a matter of remembering her and digging deep to find yours.Find the inspiration and power you need from the poetry written in these pages. Find the one that resonates with you when you're angry, one that brings out your loving warrior, or the perfect powerful inspiration for when you are facing a test in this endeavour we call Life.
author: Colleen Millsteed
